I am a security researcher, interested in understanding and addressing security problems in cyberspace. My current research interests include Network Security, IoT Security, and Abuse Detection and Understanding. Since June 2019, I have joined Facebook as a Research Scientist, working on various security projects such as Fuzzing, Proxy Detection, and Network Reputation Prediction.

Before joining Facebook, I had a four-year HAPPY ðŸ˜Ž research journey as a Ph.D. student at Indiana University (Go, Hoosiers!), under the supervision of Professor Feng Qian and Professor XiaoFeng Wang. And even before my Ph.D. study, I joined the fathers’ association when my son was born in Feb 2015. While it makes my Ph.D. study more challenging and stressful, life indeed becomes more enjoyable and meaningful for me.
